Updated November     pm



Most art gallery fundraising events are blacktie affairs that show artwork sale for thousands of dollars while attendees sip on drinks as expensive as the average college students bar tab from an entire weekend PERIOD

The Henry Art Gallery will bend the rules with Bashville this years westernthemed version of its annual fundraiser PERIOD Rather than requiring formal attire the Henry recommends patrons dress as cowboys and cowgirls PERIOD

While tickets arent quite as cheap as a keg party they start at the modest price of  for Henry members  for the general public  for preview tickets early entrance prior to the auctions and  for the Rhinestone Cowboy Artist Tickets PERIOD

Although preview and rhinestone tickets include early entry and a private performance by singer Sarah Rudinoff with Rick Miller on guitar visitors serious about buying inexpensive art might think twice about saddling up for the expensive tickets PERIOD Those who pony up  for the earlyentry tickets will also receive a special Bashville belt buckle PERIOD

Bashville might be the perfect place for college students to beautify their rooms PERIOD All pieces for sale start at a mere  with an auction that will scale nonpurchased works down to  and then  with auction winners taking their pieces home at the end of the night PERIOD With more than  artists auctioning work there should be something for everyone PERIOD

If live auctions arent your thing  or if youre just feeling lucky  the gallery will hold a raffle with prizes tht will include hotel accommodations dinner wine and more PERIOD

Not everyone attending will be a genuine cowpoke so if western isnt your style dont be deterred PERIOD Photographer Alice Wheeler known for her shots of Nirvana from the Bleach days to months before Cobains death will take portraits of the willing decked out in cowboy regalia or not PERIOD

Bashville definitely spells party for all  everyone over  that is PERIOD Drinks will be served by The Wandering Cafe while KEXPs Riz Rollins DJs PERIOD
